title: Home page should load successfully with all hero content
description: Verify that the home page displays the hero section with title, description, call-to-action buttons, and hero image

title: Navigation should work correctly between all pages
description: Test routing to Services, About, Contact, Reviews, and Pricing pages

title: Book Lesson modal should open and close correctly
description: Verify that clicking the 'Book Lesson' button opens the booking modal and it can be closed
steps: Verify modal opens with 'Book a Lesson' title
Verify form fields are present (Name, Phone, Service Type, Date/Time)

title: Booking form validation should work correctly
description: Test that form validation prevents submission with invalid data
steps: Open booking modal by clicking 'Book Lesson' button
Verify error messages appear for required fields
Verify form submits successfully and shows thank you message

title: Booking form should show success message after submission
description: Verify that a thank you message appears after successful form submission
steps: Fill in name field with 'John Doe'
Select 'G2 Road-Test Prep' from service type dropdown
Select a future date and time
Verify 'Thanks! We'll confirm shortly.' message appears

title: Services page should display content
description: Verify that the Services page loads and displays service information
steps: Navigate to /services using the navigation menu
Verify page loads successfully without errors

title: Pricing page should display pricing cards
description: Verify that pricing information is correctly displayed
steps: Navigate to /pricing using the navigation menu
Verify Starter pricing card is visible
Verify Standard pricing card is visible
Verify Pro pricing card is visible

title: Reviews page should display content
description: Verify that customer testimonials page loads
steps: Navigate to /reviews using the navigation menu

title: Contact page should display content
description: Verify that the Contact page loads with contact information
steps: Navigate to /contact using the navigation menu

title: About page should display company information
description: Verify that the About page displays information about the driving school
steps: Navigate to /about using the navigation menu
